name: General Chemistry I
description: This course covers the fundamentals of chemistry, including atomic structure, chemical formulas, and the properties of gases, liquids, and solids.

name: General Chemistry II
description: This course builds on the concepts covered in General Chemistry I, covering topics like thermodynamics, kinetics, and acid-base chemistry.

name: Organic Chemistry I
description: This course covers the fundamentals of organic chemistry, including structure, nomenclature, and reaction mechanisms.

name: Organic Chemistry II
description: This course builds on the concepts covered in Organic Chemistry I, covering topics like functional group reactivity and synthesis.

name: Physical Chemistry I
description: This course covers quantum mechanics, thermodynamics, and kinetics.

name: Physical Chemistry II
description: This course builds on the concepts covered in Physical Chemistry I, covering topics like spectroscopy and statistical thermodynamics.

name: Medicinal Chemistry I
description: This course covers the fundamentals of medicinal chemistry, including drug metabolism, drug delivery, and drug action.
